text: "That's the Way of the World" is the sixth studio album by R&B; act Earth, Wind & Fire released on March 15, 1975 through Columbia Records and is the soundtrack to the 1975 movie of same name. It went to number 1 in the United Sates and in 2020 the album was ranked 420 in the rolling stone top 500 greatest albums of all time. ==Track listing== === Original issueEarth, Wind & Fire. “That’s the Way of the World”. Columbia. 1975. === ==References== Category:1975 albums Category:Earth, Wind & Fire albums
title: That's the Way of the World
